page.title: 20EVENTS: THANKS TO DOUNE
page.content: Although Doune is, in the words of its inhabitants,{QUIET AND PEACEFUL,}it has had its moments of excitement; when B.B.C.film crews and stars came to film at the castle for a "Monty Python" programme and episode of "The Borgias" - Doune Motor Museum and Ponds Nature Reserve were opened - Doune Castle Football Team played at Hampden Park in Glasgow and,"la piece de resistance", a swan and her cygnets were given a police motor escort for their procession along the Main Street! { {OUR THANKS GO TO ALL THE MANY PEOPLE {WHO ALLOWED US TO CROSS THEIR LAND, TO {INTERVIEW THEM ON THE STREET OR IN {THEIR HOUSES, WHO TOLERATED OUR {GENERAL INQUISITIVENESS, OR WHO CAME {TO US TO SHARE THEIR LOCAL KNOWLEDGE.
